field.name: summary
field.value: Exists always returns True for lazily-proxied classes.

field.name: description
field.value:
I posted this on the dev list but it got buried under the post Christmas deluge. :)
If you use the ActiveRecordBase.Exists(pkid) method on a type which is marked lazy, you will always get a True response because session.Load returns a proxy rather than throwing an ObjectNotFoundException.
Patch attached alters Exists to use session.Get rather than FindByPrimaryKey (and thus session.Load).
